post.body: never would have thought u were a Ramsey fan, We R offering the classes through kcbt, u ever been to the class? I got connections!
oh never got that... could be you are signed into several places of twitter, there is a limit on their end.
rate limit? I'm confused?
speaking of debt destruction... got hooked on Dave Ramsey, man that course has changed our financial lives! killer stuff.
good call.
Negative! I'll admit that's one major drawback. But I have a custom search for "KCBT" to catch anything aimed toward my corp. acnt
tell me about it, except now you find yourself entering into conversations that you normally would have ignored.
Oh you'll love it... the key is setting up searches... I follow anything that mentions "KC" makes it kinda fun to see what's up.
just putting my feet in... I promise not to loose my soul.
me
I hate you... I really really hate you for that...
Now you've made me hungry... well it is only 3 miles away.. is 9:40 too early for Dixon's Chili?
didn't see it in BR, but "Dark Knight" has to be amazing in BR
consider it done! sounds like the new job is working out pretty good! U gotta love a job that keeps you searching 4 new ways.
none!
basically just moving everything over to a new wp site, and mobile theme.
you get it from netflix? any chance I can borrow it for a day?
hackers? is that any good? I've seen it on a couple of times and skipped over it.
ah, but there is a difference between the perfect girl and the one you keep going back to for no reason!
you need to check out http://tinyurl.com/6x9vaa twitter in your gtalk
you can thank Mr. Burdick for that story!
Just got my beta access to City of Heroes for the Mac.... So now I must decide Hero or Villian?
Feeling pretty Christmassy, although with all the decorations out my livingroom looks more Christmessy
MEETINGS, MEETING, every door I go through, I end up in another meeting.. It's like a bad twilight episode! make it stop
After much debate I must go down the path of @mrwags5 regarding music... thumping rhythme is the key! Listening to the Batman Begins sndtrck
Time to start coding that new site.... any music recomendations? no @shanepardue Tiny Tim is not an option.
Everytime @shanepardue hears "This call is connecting via level 3 communications" coming from my office phone, he cries a little inside.
Rough start to my Thursday, it can only get better.... right?
checking out some sweet apps on linux. awn is a nice osx style dock.
Watch your computer illiterate neighbors trash this week for a free Zune!
Rockin out to some classic Alan Parsons Project! Yea, that's how I roll.
back in the saddle for the last time this year, hmm... that sounds like a country song.
Just finish "A New Hope" in Starwars Lego. Amazing game, great choice babe!
Later tweeple, it's Lego Starwars time!
Just figured out how 2 redo kcbt.org site proper like, upside it will be killer with mobile interface, down side... I'm going to loose sleep
I have failed as a husband, wife just emailed me the 1-800-goog-411 phone number, thinking I didn't know about it. sad really.
Just watched my co-worker cry as I corrected them that yes, we are working tomorrow.
RT: @leolaporte thanks to twit get a FREE audio book about Dylan's "Highway 61 revisited" here http://audible.com/twit33
Linux is that HS girlfriend you go back to when U get rejected by other OS's, she's different, but after a week U remember how crazy she is.
Holiday fun: friend just told me of a holiday dinner at the old folks home, the baked ham was under the Happy Hanukkah banner, how ironic
